divs: Sighting DetailsObserved strange object hovering near t.v. Broadcast tower in Richmond, VA. Sighting took place the same day the largest earthquake ever recorded struck Virginia. Shot detailed video of strange light for about 10 minutes before object flew out of sight. Object exhibited a flight path that was erratic and not possible by conventional aircraft. Strange blinking lights on the object were also observed. Still in possession of video, have field agent contact me for a copy.
Summary: Observed object blinking strange lights and shot video
